mapper.sql: id, vehicle_id, terminal_phone, alarm, status_field, latitude, longitude, elevation, speed, direction, time, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into ter_location
id,
vehicle_id,
terminal_phone,
alarm,
status_field,
latitude,
longitude,
elevation,
speed,
direction,
time,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{vehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{terminalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{statusField,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{elevation,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

mapper.update:
update ter_location
vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
terminal_phone = #{terminalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm = #{alarm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status_field = #{statusField,jdbcType=INTEGER},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
elevation = #{elevation,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
speed = #{speed,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP },
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ter_location set vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, terminal_phone = #{terminalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm = #{alarm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_field = #{statusField,jdbcType=INTEGER}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, elevation = #{elevation,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP } where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
